title: Count Character in String
description:
COUNT_CHAR determines how often the sign of CHR in the string STR ocï¿¾curs. To search for special characters and control characters, the search
character CHR is specifed as BYTE.
name: COUNT_CHAR

input.name: str
input.description: Input variable of type STRING with the specified length.

input.name: chr
input.description: Input variable of type BYTE representing the character to count.

return_value.description: Returns the count of occurrences of the specified character in the string.
